cleaned_text: Epilepsy Foundation Pipeline Conference What is the Pipeline Conference? The Pipeline Conference showcases the latest developments in the epilepsy pipeline from preclinical to right before FDA approval. NOTE: the next Pipeline Conference will be held in 2024. Please check back later for more details. 2022 Epilepsy Pipeline Conference June 5-6, 2022 This premiere event is held every two years to bring together decision-makers in the field of epilepsy treatment, therapeutic innovation, and product development. This exciting meeting provides a forum for evaluating new therapies in development, exploring future advancements, and encouraging collaborations and partnerships. The Pipeline Conference will also feature the Epilepsy Foundation's Annual Shark Tank Competition and presentation of the 2022 Lifetime Accelerator Award. About the Conference Speakers and attendees include: - Emerging biotech and medical technology companies - Pharmaceutical and device companies - Researchers and innovators at the cutting-edge of epilepsy and CNS treatment advances Topics include: - Personalized medicine - Impact of COVID-19 on clinical trials - Health equity in clinical trials - New technology adoption Meeting Venue: Santa Clara Marriott 2700 Mission College Boulevard Santa Clara, California 95054 For questions, contact [pipeline@efa.org](mailto:pipeline@efa.org) Sponsorship The 2022 Epilepsy Pipeline Conference welcomes support and sponsorship from companies and philanthropic entities passionate about the new frontier of brain science and innovation in epilepsy treatments and diagnostics. If you are interested in sponsorship opportunities, please contact Nicole Murray at [nmurray@efa.org](mailto:nmurray@efa.org) Travel grants for fellows The Epilepsy Foundation, the Epilepsy Study Consortium, and the Pediatric Epilepsy Research Foundation have pooled their funds to provide travel grants to the conference for Epilepsy Fellow/Junior Faculty and Pediatric Epilepsy Fellows. Thank You to Our Sponsors Thank you for your support to make the 2022 Epilepsy Foundation Pipeline Conference a successful event and your commitment to the epilepsy community. Resources Epilepsy Centers Epilepsy centers provide you with a team of specialists to help you diagnose your epilepsy and explore treatment options. Epilepsy Medication Find in-depth information on anti-seizure medications so you know what to ask your doctor. Epilepsy and Seizures 24/7 Helpline Call our Epilepsy and Seizures 24/7 Helpline and talk with an epilepsy information specialist or submit a question online. Tools & Resources Get information, tips, and more to help you manage your epilepsy.
